    This function assigns colors to the nodes based on their abundance at the specified taxonomic level.

    abs_mat.Rd

    This function assigns colors to the nodes based on their abundance at the specified taxonomic level.

    abs_mat (abs.list, g.list, n)

    Arguments

    abs.list

    Abundance list, the same lists you used to generate the network.

    g.list

    List of igraph objects (multilayer network).

    n

    Vertex number. Notice that if n>20 the nodes won't show so big.

    Value

    Returns a matrix, each column is a layer, and the values of the rows corresponds to the size of each node.

    Examples

    
g <- readRDS (file = "examples/Dstool_mlnet.rds")
#> Warning: cannot open compressed file 'examples/Dstool_mlnet.rds', probable reason 'No such file or directory'
#> Error in gzfile(file, "rb"): cannot open the connection

abs_mat (david_stool_lineages, g, 10)
#> Error in abs_mat(david_stool_lineages, g, 10): could not find function "abs_mat"
